meanings.definition: Having small serrations along the edge.
meanings.sent1: The serrulate leaves felt rough to the touch.
meanings.sent2: The serrulate pattern on the leaf helped identify the plant.
meanings.sent3: The serrulate edges of the leaf looked like tiny saw teeth.
meanings.sent4: Her attention to detail was as serrulate as the leaf's edge.
meanings.sent5: The serrulate appearance of the leaf made it stand out in the forest.

meanings.definition: A leaf with small serrations along the edge.
meanings.sent1: I found a beautiful serrulate leaf on the ground.
meanings.sent2: The serrulate of the leaf made it easy to distinguish from others.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel used the serrulate leaf as a cozy blanket.
meanings.sent4: The serrulate leaf danced in the wind like a delicate fan.
meanings.sent5: The serrulate leaf's texture was like a secret code to nature.
